item.title: 纽约市广播公司报告第三季度亏损，雨天资金增加
item.description: 纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）周五公布了第三季度的亏损报告，因为这家地区性贷款机构预留了更多的准备金以应对潜在的贷款损失。【原文：New York Community Bancorp reported a loss for the third quarter on Friday as the regional lender set aside more reserves to cover potential loan losses.】

item.title: 多伦多证券交易所期货在零售销售数据公布前持平
item.description: 周五，与加拿大主要股指挂钩的期货价格持平，原因是原油价格的上涨被金属价格的下跌所抵消，同时投资者在等待当天晚些时候的国内经济数据。【原文：Futures tied to Canada's main stock index were flat on Friday, as a rise in crude prices was countered by losses in metals, while investors awaited domestic economic data later in the day.】

item.title: 德克斯户外（Deckers Outdoor）因霍卡鞋需求激增而股价大涨
item.description: Deckers Outdoor 在周五的盘前交易中股价大涨约 15%，此前该鞋类制造商上调了年度销售预期，并因需求恢复而超出第二季度预期。【原文：Deckers Outdoor shares jumped about 15% in premarket trading on Friday after the shoemaker raised its annual sales forecast and beat second-quarter expectations, on resilient demand.】

item.title: 大众汽车公司工会主席表示，大众汽车仍未提出品牌未来计划
item.description: 大众汽车集团劳资协议会负责人在一份发给员工的文件中说，大众汽车迄今尚未提出如何使其同名品牌更具竞争力的计划，并补充说管理层仍然只关注劳动力成本。【原文：Volkswagen has so far not presented a plan for how to make its namesake brand more competitive, the head of the group's works council said in a handout to staff, adding management remained solely focused on labour costs.】

item.title: 阿伯克龙比公司前首席执行官杰弗里斯将在性交易案中认罪
item.description: Abercrombie & Fitch 的前长期首席执行官迈克-杰弗里斯（Mike Jeffries）被控在领导这家服装零售商期间实施国际性贩卖和卖淫计划，将于周五接受传讯。【原文：Mike Jeffries, the former longtime chief executive of Abercrombie & Fitch , will be arraigned on Friday after being charged with running an international sex trafficking and prostitution scheme while leading the clothing retailer.】

item.title: 国债收益率下降，期货上涨；特斯拉下滑
item.description: 周五，美国股指期货走高，尽管特斯拉下跌，但国债收益率下降为股市提供了一些宽慰，不过三大股指似乎都将出现周线下跌。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged higher on Friday, with a decline in Treasury yields offering some relief to equities despite a drop in Tesla, although all three major indexes looked poised for a weekly loss.】

item.title: 医疗保险公司 Centene 凭借商业计划优势实现盈利目标
item.description: Centene 公司周五公布的第三季度利润超过了华尔街的预期，原因是其商业保险业务的优势超过了政府支持的低收入人群医疗补助计划的高成本影响。【原文：Centene beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Friday, as strength in its commercial insurance business outweighed the impact of high costs related to its government-backed Medicaid plans for low-income people.】

item.title: 特朗普憎恨拜登的气候法。他的盟友从中牟利
item.description: 特朗普的亲密盟友中至少有七位是绿色减税的重要受益者。【原文：At least seven of Trump's close allies are significant beneficiaries of green tax breaks.】

item.title: 美国法院阻止卡普里与 Tapestry 85 亿美元的合并案后，卡普里股价暴跌 46
item.description: 迈克尔-科尔斯公司（Michael Kors）的所有者卡普里公司（Capri）的股价在周五的盘前交易中下跌了近 46%，因为美国法官阻止了该公司与手提包制造商 Tapestry 公司（Tapestry.com）即将进行的 85 亿美元的合并。【原文：Shares of Michael Kors owner Capri slumped nearly 46% in premarket trading on Friday after a U.S. judge blocked its pending $8.5 billion merger with handbag maker Tapestry .】

item.title: 工会拒绝波音报价威胁航空供应商的工作岗位
item.description: 罢工工人拒绝了飞机制造商波音公司的最新合同要约，这对家族企业独立锻造公司（Independent Forge）等航空航天供应商的运营造成了新的威胁。【原文：Striking workers' rejection of planemaker Boeing's latest contract offer has created a fresh threat to operations at aerospace suppliers such as family-run Independent Forge.】

item.title: 麦当劳的大肠杆菌危机表明为什么蔬菜比牛肉更难保持清洁
item.description: 周四，在麦当劳被指可能是大肠杆菌爆发的源头后，美国主要快餐连锁店暂时将新鲜洋葱从其菜单上删除，这暴露了餐馆经常出现的噩梦：与牛肉相比，农产品对餐馆来说是一个更大的污染问题。【原文：Moves by major U.S. fast-food chains to temporarily scrub fresh onions off their menus on Thursday, after the vegetable was named as the likely source of an E. coli outbreak at McDonald's , laid bare the recurring nightmare for restaurants: Produce is a bigger problem for restaurants to keep free of contamination than beef.】

item.title: 早间交易：大盘股盈利迫在眉睫，日本做出决定，金边债券摇摆不定
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 巴克莱胜诉，削减英国投资者 7.27 亿美元的 "黑池 "诉讼费
item.description: 巴克莱银行周五在伦敦高等法院的股东诉讼案中胜诉，诉讼金额高达 5.6 亿英镑（约合 7.27 亿美元），巴克莱涉嫌在其私人 "黑池 "交易平台上误导市场。【原文：Barclays on Friday won its bid to more than halve a shareholders' lawsuit worth up to 560 million pounds ($727 million) at London's High Court for allegedly misleading the market about its private "dark pool" trading platforms.】

item.title: 瑞银全球财富管理将全球股市立场上调至 "有吸引力 "评级
item.description: 瑞银全球财富管理公司（UBS Global Wealth Management）将其对全球股市的立场从 "中性 "上调至 "有吸引力"，理由是美国经济增长有韧性，而且主要央行都在放宽货币政策。【原文：UBS Global Wealth Management raised its stance on global equities to "attractive" from "neutral", citing resilient U.S. economic growth and the monetary policy easing by major central banks.】

item.title: 中国自动驾驶公司 WeRide 在美国上市融资 1.2 亿美元
item.description: 自动驾驶公司 WeRide 周五在美国首次公开募股中募集到 1.2 亿美元，估值达到 42.1 亿美元，成为最新一家利用监管障碍放宽在纽约上市的中国公司。【原文：Self-driving firm WeRide notched a valuation of $4.21 billion after raising $120 million in its U.S. initial public offering on Friday, becoming the latest Chinese company to capitalize on easing regulatory hurdles to list in New York.】

item.title: 消息人士称，法航荷航对葡萄牙航空公司私有化的所有选项持开放态度
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，法航荷航希望参与葡萄牙航空公司 TAP 的私有化，并对政府可能提供的各种方案持开放态度，包括购买少数股权。【原文：Air France-KLM wants to take part in the privatisation of Portugal's carrier TAP and is open to various options the government may offer, including purchasing a minority stake, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: Holcim 北美业务分拆进展 "极为顺利"
item.description: Holcim 首席财务官 Steffen Kindler 周五表示，Holcim 分拆北美业务的进展 "非常顺利"，并计划很快向投资者通报最新进展。【原文：Holcim's spin-off of its North American business is progressing "extremely well", Chief Financial Officer Steffen Kindler said on Friday, with updates for investors planned soon.】

item.title: 澳大利亚储备银行报告 2024 年会计亏损 28 亿澳元
item.description: 澳大利亚中央银行周五表示，由于大流行病干预措施的遗留问题在其资产负债表上挥之不去，2024 年澳大利亚中央银行连续第四年出现会计亏损。【原文：Australia's central bank recorded its fourth straight year of accounting losses in 2024, it said on Friday, as the legacy of its pandemic interventions lingers on its balance sheet.】

item.title: 欧盟与中国同意就电动汽车关税的潜在替代方案举行更多会谈
item.description: 欧盟委员会周五表示，欧盟和中国已同意尽快就中国制造电动汽车关税的可能替代方案举行进一步技术性谈判，尽管仍存在巨大差距。【原文：The European Union and China have agreed to hold further technical negotiations soon on possible alternatives to tariffs on China-built electric vehicles, although significant gaps remain, the European Commission said on Friday.】

item.title: NatWest 上调收入展望，贷款增长推动利润增长
item.description: NatWest 公布第三季度利润增长 26%，并上调了 2024 年的收入预期，原因是尽管英国经济前景不明朗，但该公司在保持利润率的同时实现了贷款和存款的增长。【原文：NatWest reported a 26% rise in third-quarter profit and raised its income forecast for 2024, as it grew lending and deposits while sustaining margins despite an uncertain UK economic outlook.】

item.title: 伊莱克斯第三季度利润不及预期
item.description: 世界第二大电器制造商瑞典伊莱克斯公司周五公布的第三季度调整后营业利润低于预期，但表示其北美业务的亏损有所收窄。【原文：Sweden's Electrolux , the world's second-biggest appliances maker, reported on Friday a smaller third-quarter adjusted operating profit than expected but said losses at its North America business narrowed.】

item.title: 挪威雅苒公司第三季度利润超出预期
item.description: 全球最大的化肥生产商之一雅苒国际公司周五公布的第三季度核心盈利高于市场预期，理由是创纪录的产量和对核心业务的重视提高了盈利能力。【原文：Yara International , one of the world's largest fertilizer producers, reported third-quarter core earnings above market expectations on Friday, citing record production and its focus on core operations to boost profitability.】

item.title: 拉脱维亚中央银行行长称欧洲央行现在无需考虑低于中性利率的问题
item.description: 拉脱维亚央行行长马丁斯-卡扎克斯（Martins Kazaks）表示，欧洲央行可能需要比早先设想的更快一些放宽政策，但利率不需要降至央行刺激经济增长的水平。【原文：The European Central Bank may need to ease policy somewhat faster than earlier thought but interest rates do not need to fall to a level where the bank is stimulating economic growth, Latvian central bank chief Martins Kazaks said.】

item.title: 意大利埃尼公司第三季度业绩好于预期，将回购规模提高至 20 亿欧元
item.description: 意大利能源集团埃尼公司周五表示，在公布好于预期的第三季度业绩后，将把股票回购计划增加到 20 亿欧元（22 亿美元）。【原文：Italian energy group Eni said on Friday it would increase its share buyback programme to 2 billion euros ($2.2 billion) after reporting better than expected third-quarter results.】

item.title: 人头马君度下调销售展望，美国和中国市场影响第二季度业绩
item.description: 法国烈酒生产商人头马康特罗周五警告说，由于中国市场状况恶化，该公司报告的季度销售额下降幅度超过预期，因此该公司不再期望 2024/25 年全年的销售额会逐步恢复。【原文：French spirits maker Remy Contreau on Friday warned it no longer expected sales to gradually recover in full year 2024/25 after it reported a worse-than-expected fall in quarterly sales amid worsening market conditions in China.】

item.title: 受疫苗销售提振，赛诺菲第三季度盈利超出市场预期
item.description: 受季节性疫苗销售早于预期的影响，法国制药商赛诺菲周五公布的第三季度盈利增长强于分析师预期。【原文：French drug maker Sanofi on Friday posted stronger earnings growth than analysts had expected in the third quarter, helped by earlier-than-anticipated sales of seasonal vaccines.】

item.title: 挪威航空公司第三季度利润不及预期
item.description: 挪威廉价航空公司周五公布的第三季度核心盈利低于市场预期，并表示由于波音公司的飞机交付延迟，该公司2025年的运力增长将放缓。【原文：Budget airline Norwegian Air reported third-quarter core earnings on Friday that were below market expectations, and said its 2025 capacity growth would slow because of delays in delivery of aircraft from Boeing.】

item.title: 赛峰集团在喷气发动机延误后对预测做出不同调整
item.description: 法国喷气发动机制造商赛峰集团（Safran）下调了今年的收入预期，但在供应瓶颈导致LEAP发动机交付延迟后，将利润目标上调。【原文：French jet engine maker Safran trimmed its revenue forecast for the year but nudged its profit goal higher after supply bottlenecks delayed deliveries of LEAP engines.】

item.title: 中国豪华车需求疲软，奔驰汽车第三季度盈利骤降 64
item.description: 德国高档汽车制造商梅赛德斯-奔驰周五表示，由于经济疲软，中国消费者继续减少购买奢侈品，该公司核心汽车部门的第三季度盈利大幅下降了64%。【原文：German premium automaker Mercedes-Benz on Friday said third-quarter earnings in the core car division plunged by 64% as Chinese consumers continued to cut back on luxury goods off the back of a weakening economy.】

item.title: Holcim 第三季度利润超出预期
item.description: Holcim 公司周五表示，尽管销售额下滑，但该建筑材料制造商第三季度的营业利润好于预期。【原文：Holcim reported better than expected operating profit during its third quarter, the construction materials maker said on Friday, despite a downturn in sales.】
